org.neo4j.logging

Class FormattedLogProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.logging.AbstractLogProvider<FormattedLog>
      • org.neo4j.logging.FormattedLogProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogProvider

    public class FormattedLogProvider
extends AbstractLogProvider<FormattedLog>
    A LogProvider implementation that applies a simple formatting to each log message.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FormattedLogProvider.Builder
      A Builder for a FormattedLogProvider

    • Method Detail

      • withoutRenderingContext

        public static FormattedLogProvider.Builder withoutRenderingContext()
        Start creating a FormattedLogProvider which will not render the context (or class name) in each output line. Use FormattedLogProvider.Builder.toOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream) to complete.
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLogProvider

      • withUTCTimeZone

        public static FormattedLogProvider.Builder withUTCTimeZone()
        Start creating a FormattedLogProvider with UTC timezone for datestamps in the log
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLogProvider

      • withTimeZone

        public static FormattedLogProvider.Builder withTimeZone(TimeZone timezone)
        Start creating a FormattedLogProvider with the specified timezone for datestamps in the log
        Parameters:
        timezone - the timezone to use for datestamps
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLogProvider

      • withLogLevel

        public static FormattedLogProvider.Builder withLogLevel(FormattedLog.Level level)
        Start creating a FormattedLogProvider with the specified log FormattedLog.Level for all Logs by default. Use FormattedLogProvider.Builder.toOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream) to complete.
        Parameters:
        level - the log level to use as a default
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLogProvider

      • withoutAutoFlush

        public static FormattedLogProvider.Builder withoutAutoFlush()
        Start creating a FormattedLogProvider without auto flushing. Use FormattedLogProvider.Builder.toOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream) to complete.
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLogProvider

      • toOutputStream

        public static FormattedLogProvider toOutputStream(OutputStream out)
        Creates a FormattedLogProvider instance that writes messages to an OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - An OutputStream to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLogProvider instance that writes to the specified OutputStream

      • toOutputStream

        public static FormattedLogProvider toOutputStream(Supplier<OutputStream> outSupplier)
        Creates a FormattedLogProvider instance that writes messages to OutputStreams obtained from the specified Supplier. The OutputStream is obtained from the Supplier before every log message is written.
        Parameters:
        outSupplier - A supplier for an output stream to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLogProvider instance

      • toWriter

        public static FormattedLogProvider toWriter(Writer writer)
        Creates a FormattedLogProvider instance that writes messages to a Writer.
        Parameters:
        writer - A Writer to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLogProvider instance that writes to the specified Writer

      • toPrintWriter

        public static FormattedLogProvider toPrintWriter(PrintWriter writer)
        Creates a FormattedLogProvider instance that writes messages to a PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        writer - A PrintWriter to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLogProvider instance that writes to the specified PrintWriter

      • toPrintWriter

        public static FormattedLogProvider toPrintWriter(Supplier<PrintWriter> writerSupplier)
        Creates a FormattedLogProvider instance that writes messages to PrintWriters obtained from the specified Supplier. The PrintWriter is obtained from the Supplier before every log message is written.
        Parameters:
        writerSupplier - A supplier for a PrintWriter to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLogProvider instance that writes to the specified PrintWriter
